p: Qualitative analysis of the major groups of phytoconstituents (such as flavonoids, alkaloids, terpenoids, saponins, tannins, glycosides etc) in the powdered plant material was performed as per the standard methodology mentioned in Additional file 1. The qualitatively detected phytoconstituents were then quantified as described previously [ 19, 20] and screened for their antimicrobial potential along with some antibiotics (Additional file 1).
